Station Update - Sydenham

Platforms 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works. A new Metro concourse is being constructed on the northern end of Sydenham Station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please ask staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
https://transportnsw.info/alerts#/train
Station Update - Central

There are changes happening at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Access to certain areas of the station and platforms may mean using different stairs, escalators and lifts. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff. For detailed information please visit https://transportnsw.info/alerts/details#/6049959

Hawkesbury Rd bus stop closures and diversions

From 8pm Friday 5 June, Hawkesbury Rd, Westmead will be one-way in a southbound direction between Darcy Rd and Hainsworth St. The following stops will be permanently closed:

∙ The Westmead Institute Hawkesbury Rd (214516)
∙ Westmead Hospital Hawkesbury Rd (214517)

The alternative stops are Westmead Children's Hospital Hawkesbury Rd (214515) or Darcy Rd after Hawkesbury Rd (214518).

From 8pm Friday 5 June, Hawkesbury Rd, Westmead will be one-way in a southbound direction between Darcy Rd and Hainsworth St. The following stops will be permanently closed:
  • The Westmead Institute Hawkesbury Rd (214516)
  • Westmead Hospital Hawkesbury Rd (214517)
The alternative stops are Westmead Children’s Hospital Hawkesbury Rd (214515) or Darcy Rd after Hawkesbury Rd (214518).

The Crescent, Annandale temporary bus stop closure

The westbound bus stop on The Crescent at Johnston St (203816) will be temporarily closed from Monday 16 November 2020 until Wednesday 30 June 2021 for WestConnex Rozelle Interchange works.

Route 433 services towards Balmain Gladstone Park and Major Event Bus route 2 towards Sydney Olympic Park will use the stop on The Crescent at View St (203815) instead.

Check signs for directions to the alternative stop location.

Crows Nest, temporary bus stop closure

From 4am Monday 11 January 2021 to the end of August 2023, Sydney Metro works will see bus stop Pacific Hwy after Oxley St (206515) close. 

The alternative stop will be Pacific Hwy after Albany St (206514) affecting routes 114, 144, 252, 254, 257, 265, 286, 287, 290, 291 and 320 heading towards the North Sydney, McMahons Point, the Northern Beaches, the city and Mascot.

Due to station redevelopment work some platforms have reduced capacity. Please avoid standing in front of construction zones and remain behind the yellow line on the platform

Station Update - Central

From 11 January to end-December 2021, the escalators and staircase connecting the corner of Pitt Street and Eddy Avenue with the Grand Concourse and L1 Light Rail stop will be closed due to station upgrade works. 

To access the Grand Concourse and Platforms 1 to 12 from the street level, please use the Western Forecourt entry via Pitt Street. To access Platforms 16 to 25 from the street level, please use the Eddy Avenue entry. 

To access Pitt Street or Eddy Avenue from the Grand Concourse or L1 light rail stop, please exit the station via the Western Forecourt or Northern Concourse.

By The C Concert - Don Lucas Reserve, Cronulla
13:00 to 21:00

- Shuttle buses operate from Campbelltown station, stopping at Macarthur and then Menangle Park station

Sydney Gay and Lesbian Mardi Gras Parade 2021-  Sydney Cricket Ground, Moore Park
18:00 to 22:00
